availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Garrett County, Illinois, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Thomas Cogdal and Mary Cogdal. Married to Sophia Bale Cogdal in Green County, Kentucky. Father of Lucy Ellen Cogdal. Farmer in Hart County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Garrett County, Illinois, in 1863. Resident in Garrett County in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hart County, p. 197A.
Illinois State Census(1865), Population Schedules, Garrett County, p. 20.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Garrett County, IL, June 1863.
"Joseph Cogdal (1824-1896)," Find A Grave, Memorial 13856694, accessed June 6, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/13856694.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994036, Green County Births.
